title: Onboarding Patterns
excerpt: Guiding new users through your application effectively.
content:
Onboarding patterns are crucial for introducing new users to your application and helping them understand its key features and benefits. Effective onboarding can improve user retention and satisfaction.

Common Patterns

  • Welcome Tour: A guided walkthrough of key features
  • Progressive Disclosure: Revealing features gradually as users need them
  • Contextual Help: Providing guidance within the interface as users explore
  • Empty States: Using initial blank screens to guide users on how to get started

Best Practices

  1. Keep it concise and focused on key features
  2. Allow users to skip or revisit the onboarding process
  3. Use visual cues and animations to guide attention
  4. Personalize the experience based on user preferences or roles
  5. Measure and iterate based on user feedback and analytics
